website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and functional torchére stand with uplight shade. Adds an excellent ambience to any room.
pros: Offers exceptional value for money, considering the quality
Lets you use your preferred LED bulb to achieve your ideal light
cons: Some users find the exposed cord to be a design flaw

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews have been hard on this product related to the power cord situation... but honestly that is this lamp's best feature!!!! We foster for animal rescue organizations and so we are consistantly looking for ways to improve our pet safety. Cords are typically the greatest challenge in this endeavor. Finally! Finally we can have a floor lamp and not be concerned about the pups getting at the cord!!!! Consider this product for increased pet and child safety.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 4 of these now for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of these now for a reason! I have TP Link bulbs in them that work with Alexa. "Alexa, turn light 1 blue!" ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the recommended bulb if you want a bright light!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, the recommended bulb doesn't give good light with this lamp at all, certainly not good reading light by my standard. I saw the recommended led bulb was only 400 lumens but people seemed to think it gave off good light so I tried it out anyhow. I ended up using a fluorescent bulb instead. A 15W (about a 60W replacement) works much better than the recommended bulb but I'm getting a 23W (about 100W replacement) now to make it even brighter (1600 lumens). Great lamp otherwise! Easy to assemble, looks great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Todd F

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this ikea garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these when moving into my apartment a year ago. Only 1 is still fully functional. 2 had to be returned almost immediately because the bulb socket was malformed and wouldnt power anything. 1 is stuck in the on position. I have to screw the bulb in and out to turn it off. The last one went thru 8 light bulbs constantly burning them out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, heavy duty, beyond worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what everyone here is complaining about. I absolutely love this lamp. It was less than 20 bucks and is heavier and sturdier than anything you'll find in Target or Walmart. A pleasant surprise. If you're looking for something elegant or super fancy then spend the extra money somewhere else. This thing is practical and exceeds expectations. I also love how thick the metal is on the entire frame. Solid, heavy base to prevent tipping. And unless you're 6 feet or taller you're not going to "stare at the bulb". Don't be cheap AND tall, you can only pick one struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at any cost
customer_reviews.text: Bingo Grabe was the seller in my case for TWO grossly defective Ikea standing lamps. Because I believe in honor I gave the seller an opportunity behind the scenes to make this right by me. He or she declined to do so despite an offer of documentation of the problem. under no circumstances should you purchase this cruddy standing lamp despite the low cost. See attached pictures for fracture lines that occurred within days of assembly in BOTH lamp shades and of excess stringy plastic that I had to remove by hand. There is cheap and then there is crap.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent lamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lamp for the money. I have a finished basement with 6 can lights in the ceiling that lights up the room like a football field. I needed a simple lamp in the corner to provide enough light without blinding me! This lamp fit the bill perfectly. It's not a luxury lamp people, look at the price! However, it is very sturdy, easy to assemble and i put in a 60 watt LED bulb and with one bulb,it adds the perfect amount of light to the room. As for the cord, doesn't bother me at all that it's outside the pole. Great lamp, especially when you consider the great price
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: What it is (Yo!)
customer_reviews.text: You'll like the lamp if you: * Need something for the dorm room/basement/garage * Aren't concerned with creating ambiance on par with the Louvre (or any ambiance at all for that matter) * Are constrained by budget to spend >$25 * Couldn't be troubled to deal with the braniacs at Walmart or shuffle through Home Depot for an hour * Just need a light in 48 hrs (please!!!)
customer_reviews.author: area manTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Works with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient
customer_reviews.text: Works with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing qualityWorks with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing qualityWorks with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing qualityWorks with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing quality Works with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing qualityWorks with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing qualityWorks with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing qualityWorks with led and incandescent light bulbs, wonderfully efficient and so very practical. amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: Royal J. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lamps, although you can get them a good deal cheaper at the IKEA store. Easy to assemble, well made, attractive and functional. I bought one at the store, but then a few months later bought a second one for another room here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you really can't beat it. I bought three and they all came well packaged and well kept. The outter shipping box was all messed up, though. The cord isn't inside of the pole which is slightly annoying. When I first assembled them, I couldn't find a piece that holds the globe into the lamp. The piece is actually screwed into the lamp already, you just unscrew it and put the globe on then screw the piece on to hold the globe down. Another thing to mention is that you can customize the length of the pole. The pole is five peices that simply screw together. Easily customizable. Not too bad, all in all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Lights up the room nice, but I wouldn't buy this again because it was missing the top screw that holds the lamp shade tight.
customer_reviews.author: anniebaby916

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this because my ceiling fan light broke and I needed a light for my bedroom till I could fix the fan light. It lights up my room perfectly that I actually forgot that my ceiling light was still broke. Also love that the light switch on here is at the top and not the bottom so I don't have to bend down to turn off light. Plus extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: MegRenee

customer_reviews.title: The lamp itself is sturdy and seems to be well-made
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself is sturdy and seems to be well-made, but I purchased 2 of these from different places and both came with the same missing part. Ikea clearly has a problem with quality control. Don't purchase with the bulb -- the including one is dim and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp! I use it daily
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lamp! I use it daily. I bought some extra lightbulbs (girlfriend works at a lightbulb company). It gives plenty of light, and was pretty easy to assemble. When I bought it, I was initially concerned about the exterior cord running outside the pole to the top. I have the cord gently wrapped twice around the pole leading to the ground and that looks fine. In fact, it gives it more of an "antique" appearance. The on/off switch is in-line on this cord, and it hangs about 2/3 up the height of the pole.
customer_reviews.author: KU Alumnus

customer_reviews.title: Cost-effective and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Lowest price for a standing lamp on Amazon, especially from Warehouse Deals when they're usually around $15. Would buy again as soon as it gets back down to that price point. Seems a lot more sturdy than the two cheaper options it replaced that fell apart after a year and fell over just twice. The only negative is the external string doesn't go inside the metal rail but follows up and out and there's no way to get it flush with the metal like inth photo.
customer_reviews.author: Rod B.

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and put hue bulbs in them and I have no complaints. I might like them to be capable of somewhat greater brightness, but I think that's a bulb issue rather than a lamp one. (Update: I’ve had some quality issues with IKEA products in the past, but not with these so far. I’ve had them for two or three months now and they are looking and working as new. Quite satisfied.)
customer_reviews.author: Ian D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamp, but it was missing the white piece that protects the bulb. I got crafty with a paper lantern and I think it looks neat, but it really should have come with all the pieces :/ I DO think it’s funny that it’s called not a lamp. It really is a lamp. The cord hangs from the top instead of the bottom, but I think it’s not that big of a deal for what you are paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gramc

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed, easy to assemble, and works well. I slipped it in behind the desk to light my face when I am on webcam. I had a problem with the first one, but the company replaced it immediately, arranged for UPS to pick up the return, and gave me a rebate as well. So I have upgraded my review and have had no problems with the second one. I might order another one for another use.
customer_reviews.author: bethweiser

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive lamp that lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Bulb fizzled and burned out within one hour of turning lamp on. Other than that I really like Ikea's inexpensive, functional, and Spartan floor lamp. I've had several of these for years and just recently added another. My other lamps are over 5 years old, and I see no notable difference between this new one and the old ones. Ikea seems to be one of the few companies that don't mess with success. It throws a warm (and not intrusive) light onto ceiling. With 2 in an average room it provides plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Swearengen

customer_reviews.title: but it is just fine for the porch
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much, and truthfully the instructions were sorely lacking. However, even I could put this lamp together. We have a very bright LED light on our enclosed porch where I work out and through which I take the dogs out in the early morning. That light was just too bright! So I ordered this lamp in the hopes of having light, but much softer, and that's just what I got. It's not gorgeous -- it's just a lamp, but it is just fine for the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Billye

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, good Height
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, only took husband five/ten minutes to install. Gives off a nice light with the bulbs we also purchased for it, the only minus is that the lamp shade itself is plastic, so I'm a little worried it might melt or burn through, but overall we are happy with this lamp and will just have to watch it. So far we have not had any issues. I definitely like the little on/off button as well, instead of the old "twist to turn on" style.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lamp/light for the computer since it was in kinda a corner of the room where no light really went and got tired of being in the dark so I bought this lamp that fits perfectly in the space I wanted it. Very easy to assemble...rod screw into rod screw into rod etc so not rocket science needed. The cord is nice and long but I put it around the pole going down the lamp so it wasn't all over the floor and it looks and works perfect. I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Michael McPhearson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This guy is a little wobbly and on the cheesy-end of quality, but I couldn't beat the price! I just wanted a lamp to brighten the dismal dark hole that I call an "office" at work, and this did the trick. Don't think I would put it in my house, though, because of the cheesiness of it and I take pride in my home, but for work, I just want the bare minimum to get it done....so I went with the most inexpensive item. To clarify, the shade/bowl is plastic (not glass).
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom, who is 92 years old. We placed it right next to her recliner chair, but noticed that the on/off button was too high. Sooooo, we removed one of the bars, and now it's perfect for her to reach. My only wish is that the part of the pole that has the on/off button attached to it cannot be kept where we want it to be and still have the lamp sit at it's highest. But that's ok...she's enjoying it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Karen LeDoux

customer_reviews.title: Dome fixture plastic, but looks like glass
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as a room in my house has no light fixture in the ceiling. It is bring enough for the entire room. At first I was a tad disappointed, the dome fixture isn't glass its plastic. However, once I had it together it looks like glass, and is much lighter and durable, and is exactly what I was looking for at an extremely frugal price. I'm debating buying a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was super easy to assemble and works as promised. For those who dislike the cord hanging from the top, I personally prefer it this way. Between cats and a kid, it's nice to know they won't entangle each other and their toys in the cord. The lamp also comes with a couple of cord holders so that you can attach it to the pole neatly. I've only had this lamp for 24 hours but so far it's working as stated and looks decent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, functional, minimalist chic ....
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap lamp, I actually like the external cordage. It doesn't get tangled up when assembling the lamp and supplied clips (2) do a decent job to taming the cord the down the side of the lamp stalk. The build quality is none too stout but if you leave it alone in the corner, I don't suppose it will self-destruct. Use a bright LED bulb (100 watt equivalent) and you will get good amount of diffuse lighting in a minimalist chic packaging.
customer_reviews.author: zanypoet

customer_reviews.title: This is our ‘standard’ floor lamp.
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these and really like them. The oldest one is about two years old now and we haven’t had a single problem. Even the plastic shade is still perfectly white. We use 60 to 100 watt equivalent LED bulbs in these which don’t get too hot, which also makes these easy to clean. These work a lot better for us than the halogen / glass models. If I could improve one thing, I’d make the cord a little longer, but that’s trivial.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Post

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely impressed with not only the quality of the light and also the price! I purchased 2- one for my daughter and the other for myself and we both are happy with them. We needed some extra light in our rooms and they work perfect! Side note: I got a color changing light for my daughters and it illuminates her whole room with whatever color she makes the light.
customer_reviews.author: ~Fabulousness~

customer_reviews.title: the shade arrived broken so i sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Cheap lamp with a cheap plastic shade. Mine was DOA (cracked shade) so i sent i back and spent a few more bucks to get a torchiere with a glass shade. if you only have $20 for a lamp i suppose this is an ok purchase but IMO it's worthit to spend alittle more and get a better product. IKEA used to make a version of this with a glass shade but this one is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: E. K. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Power Cable Is Exposed
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was perfect for my needs to replace a similar style of lamp that died after about 15 years. What I didn't realize was that the power cable is exposed and runs down the pole of the lamp. It is NOT either located entirely at the base or ran through the hollow inside of the pole. Just be aware, if that will be an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great, purchased some a while back but they no ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, purchased some a while back but they no longer make the silver version so went with the black color. Overall design has stayed the same but they did seem to clean up some of the cheap feel to the switch. Wish the cord was as long as before but doesn't take away from the actual function.
customer_reviews.author: rafael murillo

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT lamp
customer_reviews.text: this lamp is a definitely a must-buy especially if you're a college student like me who needs a living room lamp but doesn't want to invest more than $20 in one. for $20, this lamp functions great and took less than 5 minutes to assemble. great bang for you buck!
customer_reviews.author: Andes Le

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price. Watch out for the power cable placement
customer_reviews.text: Not the brightest lamp out there, but for the price this is an awesome lamp. I'm happy about my purchase. Even if it's not the brightest. I bought it as a secondary support lamp for my bedroom, so it actually works out for me it isn't very bright! My only real problem with the lamp is that they put the power cable like 2 inches from the lamp shade. They have clips to keep it secured down the lamp, but I still think it's a pretty ugly looking design, and I try to hide it the best I can. There's a heads up I wish I knew before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Works great! It doesn't come with a bulb but probably because you can choose your own lighting plan. You can use LED's, CFL's, or just normal bulbs. LED's are a good choice because if you want more wattage or output you can without stressing the socket. A 100 watt LED uses only 7 watts of power and lasts 10 years and doesn't heat up. If you want more light you can get a brighter LED and still have a cool light without stressing the socket. Great light for the price but cheaper at IKEA if you have a store in your area.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lew

customer_reviews.title: This is good piece to have if you are looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good piece to have if you are looking for a standing lamp at a very affordable price. The best feature is the assembly. It is very easy to assemble (my 11 yr old daughter was able to put it together). Does not require any tools, just fit the pieces one after the other. The only reason I will give a 4 star is the top (cup that holds the light) is plastic, a glass would have added more aesthetics to the piece given that it is likely to be used in living rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks can fool
customer_reviews.text: lemme tell you this lamp shows up in the smallest box ever lol and looks crappy but dang man this is the best lamp i have ever owned i put a 100wat eq type of LED in there i got from costco its a bit bigger than it suggest but no heat so no issues man its SUPER bright and you can ajust how tall it is just by leaving out a portion of it, i love this thing thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive lamp to go in my son's room and this fit the bill. It was easy to assemble and it works well with just a standard lightbulb (anything lower than 100 W). Is it the prettiest lamp I've ever seen, no, the cord actually runs along the lamp but it stays in place well with the provided clips. It's sleek and modern looking and would fit well with a many decor. Would I use it as a replacement to a lamp in my foyer...probably not, but it's not targeted to be a focal point of the room. It is primarily for function, and for that it is a definite 5 star lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Caley G

customer_reviews.title: Short power cord
customer_reviews.text: The shade is plastic. The power cord starts at the top, so you only have about 32 inches left to from the base of the lamp to your outlet. I bought it without the bulb and went to local home improvement store and got a led bulb for under two dollars. I assemble it in less than five minutes. The base is weighted so the lamp will stay were you put it.
customer_reviews.author: RSP

customer_reviews.title: The lighting is ok if you need a small amount...
customer_reviews.text: They are really only good to help you see, but there is no overall lighting area. The lighting seems to go up straight and it limited to a very small area. These really need adjustable lighting also, of various degrees. The floor stand does stand straight and really has no issues, if you should bump into it, it's not heavy enough on the floor that it won't fall to the ground if you don't catch it fast enough. I guess that's what I get for buying a cheap lampstand.
customer_reviews.author: Seams To Be Sew

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and bright
customer_reviews.text: Although it has a goofy round ball on the top, and an awkward foot switch ( nearly impossible to find when dark ) I would definitely buy again. I never had to worry about the switch breaking, or lamp falling over due to heavy base. It is tall, so good luck hiding. I would use in a room that requires light more than style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was quick. I used a 9w 3000k led ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick. I used a 9w 3000k led bulb. Provides plenty of light with another standing lamp using same type of led bulb. The fitting to secure the lampshade is located over the socket and must be unscrewed. Place the shade over socket and screw fitting down.
customer_reviews.author: bowoex

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion, screwed together easily, came with two guides for the power cord to keep it alighed with the pole. Sturdy base that was heavy enouh to keep it in place nicely. Can't ask for ore than that at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good light!
customer_reviews.text: This light came quickly and had no issues with anything. Putting it together was super simple, except for the light shield. I didn't exactly know what to do, and the instructions didn't really help with explaining that. That's why this light get a 4 star instead of a dive. Definitely need to.update the instructions for clients who are new to putting things together. Other than that, it's sturdy, I like the switch placement, and it doesn't just tip over. It's tall enough to cast the light from a simple light bulb through the entire room. It's a good light, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Meg & Dash

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I need central light for my living room and this lamp is perfect for that. I love that it comes with clips to keep the power cord in place since it's a tall lamp - didn't come with a bulb I use GE 60 watt and it's bright for the whole room
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!!!  Buy bulbs separately ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I love how the power cord can be attached to the side of the unit as opposed to most floor lamps where you have to pull the cord through each pole attachment This allowed for not only easy assemble but fast assemble! Purchased the LCD lights recommended in ad as opposed to purchasing item with the bulbs because it was MUCH cheaper to purchase separately. The items came together and the lighting is "cozy" and not overwhelmingly bright!! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaD

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp - would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great floor lamp for the price. I was worried that the external cord would look ugly, but it grew on me really fast. Need some extra indirect light in a room, this will do it without breaking the bank. The sectional pole is sturdy and comes with several plastic clips to hold the cord to the post. The weight in the base is sufficient to keep it stable and small enough that you can squeeze it into a small spot. I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Beautiful lamp for under $20! I'm not the most handy person when it comes to assembling things, but this is super easy to put together; it's ready in less than 10 mins. I think it also came with a warranty which is also very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: Wire runs on the outside of the lamp all the way to the floor. Walmart has a better product for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: A bargain
customer_reviews.text: The heavy base is my favorite feature. The last lamp I got elsewhere used to fall at the lightest touch. My apologies to whomever carried it home for me. Assembly is what you expect from Ikea but I'll have to get used to power cords outside the pipe. For the ease of assembly, it's a tiny price to pay. The switch is also on the cable, which works for me I can easily reach it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my go-to floor lamps for simple lighting
customer_reviews.text: I owned one of these lamps before, and wanted to get a second one. These are nice, minimal, and honestly, looks good in any modern home. It's also a really sturdy lamp, the base is pretty heavy, and the poles (once connected) aren't wobbly at all. It's so cheap, but it honestly beats a lot of other modern minimal lamps which have a hollow base and otherwise, are very weak. It illuminates a lot, but depending on the bulb, it can be very subtle and dim. I do not believe you can dim these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbelievable deal at the current price of $18.65. It is nothing fancy: a plain black skinny lamp with a plastic shield for the light. But I moved into a house with no light fixtures in the bedrooms (WTH?) and I just want LIGHT for the time being; I can get fancy later. This was simple as pie to put together, and I ordered a second one for the second bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The "Modern" selection comes with a light bulb (you're not charged for it) equivalent to about a 35 watt incandescent, according to Ikea. If you want a lamp to light up your hallway or similar use where you don't need much illumination, this is a nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as I would personally like but very easy set up. The on off switch is placed higher along with the cord which is perfect for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this lamp in July 2016, it's now ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp in July 2016, it's now March 2017, 9 months later. It now will not work reliably. The bulb flickers and you have to turn the switch on and off again to get it to stop - then in about 15 minutes, it will start flickering again. I've replace the bulb to no relief.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Okay !!
customer_reviews.text: It works as its price!! I like it because I am planning to have it for a short time. I don't recommend buying this if you have kids around or having this lamp at the busy area of the house. Because the pipe of the lamp is very thin and weak, it could break off or fall over if someone have a slight bump into it.
customer_reviews.author: Huynh Bui

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp. Many people do not like the cord being on the outside of the pole, but this doesn't bother me. The lamp is easy to assemble and depending on the bulb puts out a lot of light. I will buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmusician

customer_reviews.title: A good, cheap lamp
customer_reviews.text: These lamps come in several sections. You screw the pieces together, you put a bulb in, and you turn it on. They stand up very well. They are very bright, depending on what bulb you install. They click on and off just like much more expensive floor lamps. And they are from Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Synapse

customer_reviews.title: Ikea Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic floor lamp. The cord comes down from the top rather than out the base, and the switch is on the cord. It was very easy to assemble, and seems sturdy enough. Unless you are looking for a more "decorator" style lamp, this lamp should work quite nicely in any room where you just need some extra light.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Faurot

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lamp that was cost-efficient and worked well, and this did the job. The only complaint I have about this lamp is the very visible cord that hangs from the top to the bottom of the lamp. Other than that, the lamp definitely makes the space brighter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boateng

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Took me 5 minutes if that, to assemble. The platform is almost like a concrete circle that has a plastic cap over it. The shade isn’t a glass bowl like I thought it was- it’s some kind of plastic. Which is fine because it’s a $20 lamp. I think the switch being on the side of the lamp is super convenient! I wanted something I could put next to our night stand that didn’t require me to get out of bed to turn it on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Leaning Light of Ikea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to light up my room, since it has no ceiling lights. When assembling it, I found that it leans a bit, as it's made of 3 rods screwed together. With a solid bulb in it, this lights up my entire room perfectly. I'd give it 5 stars if it wasn't for the lean, it's not insane but it's enough to stand out a bit and annoy me
customer_reviews.author: Evan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Solid and pleasant floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and spaced them about 12ft from each other in the living room and the room is so much more vibrant! It took me about 2.5 minutes to assemble both. Very stylish and would go well with any decor. The solid base promotes a very stable floor lamp. The only con so far is that the wire is incredibly short so you would need an extension cord if you need the light more than a few feet from the wall outlet. I purchased different LED light bulbs that fit the fixture so I can't comment on the version that comes with the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi

customer_reviews.title: Like everyone else says
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else says, the cord should have been ran down the middle of stand. Bulb included is 5watt not 6.3 as described, not very bright but a nice warm color perfect when watching tv. If you need a light to read or something youll need doff bulb over all worth the price i guess..
customer_reviews.author: john schneider

customer_reviews.title: My wife hates it.
customer_reviews.text: It "doesn't match" and I should have "consulted her first" before buying it. But she sat on her ass for weeks and I needed a light to play the piano. I think its great. It turns on. It turns off. It provides light. It's black. I put it together in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Kroll

customer_reviews.title: Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love my lamp it lights up my room with no issues, I brought a dollar store CFL bulb and it is still going strong 2 months later. It was an easy build and all the parts come in the box. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the little clips that are supposed to hold the plug wire to the lamp are annoying at best and ineffective at worse. I lost the first one attempting to plug the light in and the second one is holding strong, just is an irritant when adjusting the lamp. Overall I am very happy and am looking into getting more for other parts of my home.
customer_reviews.author: fatima

customer_reviews.title: ... I know a lot of the reviews say it's easy to put together-that was not my experience
customer_reviews.text: So I know a lot of the reviews say it's easy to put together-that was not my experience. I think I was missing pieces but since there were only a few illustrations of how it was supposed to go together it was really hard to tell. I had nothing to screw the pieces together to hold the top in place. Disappointed-we really needed a lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Trayers

customer_reviews.title: Great value, annoying cord
customer_reviews.text: The light is good and the shade allows it to distribute really well, lights up the 12x12 room I put it in completely. The only real issue with the lamp is the cord, which has been expressed by other reviewers, but my problem with it is the clips that are included do not hold the cord very securely. A small tug of the cord if there's little slack will send them flying off of the lamp and cause some unnecessary frustration. Otherwise, it's a very good lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Tidd

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ridiculous. The lamp shade is too small for the lamp. There is about a 2 inch gap between it. Waste of money. I would be upset if this were $5 with the issues, but to pay almost $20 for a shade to not even be made properly is just sad.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ikea: you know what you're going to get
customer_reviews.text: It is an Ikea lamp. Very simple and functional, and not ugly, if that is what you need. If you tighten it will it seems relatively stable. One aesthetic thing is that the cord comes out really high and must be wrapped around the stem. So, not too Chic, if you care about that.
customer_reviews.author: G. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Total junk, don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. I hate the whole design of these. The on off switch is in a terrible position. A twist knob would have been way better. One of the two I purchased doesn’t even work for some reason. Must be a short or something somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marc ferretti

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and does the job, but cable is ugly
customer_reviews.text: It's the cheapest floor lamp you can find on Amazon. It does the job, is stable, and the lamp shade looks quite nice. However, the power cord comes out from the top and is loosely fixed to the pole. It's very difficult to make the lamp look good with that tangly cable coming off of it. I'm sure it was done as a cost-saving measure. Make sure you check if you are buying a version with a bulb or not. The included bulb is a good LED light, but isn't too bright: I chose to buy one without the bulb and use my own brighter bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chen

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lamp for when I enter/leave my home and this one suits my need perfectly. Provides sufficient illumination The simple design would make this fit into almost any room of one's home. The on/off button is on the cord, rather than on the lamp itself. I would have liked a longer cord, fortunately, my outlet was close enough to not need an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: It just works, and for this price fits the bill exactly.
customer_reviews.text: It just works, and for this price fits the bill exactly. I've had no issues so far. I had much more expensive one before, that was just about the same. Tired of buying expensive house furnishings only to move and end up losing them. Great for a bedroom, or for any smaller type room. Not overly bright, but I guess thats just my bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Always Right

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great lamp. I like the cord wrapped around the pole. Some reviewers did not like this idea, but I have several cats, and I don't want any chewed wires and/or electrocuted cats, so for me it's ideal. Plus with the cord wrapped around the pole, it is not hanging around on the floor for anyone to trip over!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Put LED high wattage bulb in this lamp, so I don't have to worry about a fire, and it lights up the whole room. Like the easy on switch that I could put anywhere I want on the pole. Easy to put together, very heavy base. Use it in a very large bedroom. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: L. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Unadvertised feature: Adjustable height!
customer_reviews.text: One thing I didn't expect, but that quickly became a lucky find: The cord doesn't go through the tube. At first I thought it might be a little tacky, but actually... I realized I could set this on a piece of furniture with two of the four tubes and it's the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Eiland-Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, it’s a cheap lamp. I paid a cheap price, expecting to get a cheap lamp. For what it is though, it does it’s job well and works great for me. If your looking for a really nice lamp for a cheap price, I’d look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Weber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a small/medium room.
customer_reviews.text: While I do wish it supported a higher wattage bulb, it's a great sturdy lamp for the price. I bought one for my old office, and liked it so much I took it home, and have now bought this one for my bedroom. In fact the fact that it's a bit dim is an advantage in the bedroom, unless I'm searching through a pile of black clothing... In larger rooms you might want two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great lamp for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Essentially what the headline says, I needed a cheap lamp for my bedroom (Because who likes sitting in a dark room) and found this lamp and when you're on a budget a little over 20 dollars is a pretty nice price, plus the lamp is perfect for a small-mid sized bedroom/room sure it doesn't have an internal cable or anything fancy....but again...20 dollars, overall 10/10 I would absolutely recommend this floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vyse

customer_reviews.title: Works but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered had a large chip in the lamp shade. The second one I got had a smaller chip in the lamp shade. I got sick of contacting Amazon about it, so I'm just dealing with it and have faced the chip toward the wall. Other than the cheap material. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tweety Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Luv this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp came very nicely packaged, it took 5 mins to figure out. i put in a 800 lumens 9w sunbeam bulb $1 at the local thrift store, here is a photo, plenty of light!. i like that i can just reach up, flip the little switch and im sleeping. i placed it behind my adjustable bed. looks really nice in my decor. i highly recommend it as im on a tight budget. the price was right and the quality is good. the plastic dome shade looks like glass from far away. happy reading
customer_reviews.author: just a customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent lamp for a bed room - cord showing is ugly.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for a bed room corner since it's got a small footprint but doesn't look all that clean or nice with the cord running alongside the entire thing. Makes it look very incomplete but, to be fair, I bought it seeing that in the photo. I just didn't know it would annoy me as much as it does.
customer_reviews.author: Quality deserves credit

customer_reviews.title: For the price, my IKEA lamp was definitely a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed - extra light in my crafting and reading area. I used an equivalent LED 100 watt bulb, and it really made a difference.The weight of the base keeps the lamp very steady, but is easy to move. I’m surprised at how sturdy the metal pole sections are and how easy they were to put together. The on/off switch clamps in place on the pole at a convenient height. This photo does not do justice to how attractive this lamp is. Proportionally, the frosted globe looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to add light to my incredibly dark living room, which is also my workspace. I could not love this lamp more. Easy to put together, incredibly easy on/off switch, and the light it gives off is just fantastic. It feels like the kind of lamp you would buy to combat seasonal depression because the light it gives off is soft and not harsh at all. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casey May

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! Bought this when my LED floor lamp started acting up. It gives off great light with a regular bulb so don't have to buy the expensive LED sticks. The price was reasonable and it did what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic floor lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a light in a spare room and really can't complain about this unit for the price. The power cable is exposed and visible for about 2/3 the length of the stand but functionally this works great. These opinions are my own and not influenced by the manufacturer or the supplier. I love reading reviews from other customers and use them to make my own purchasing decisions. If you found this review helpful, would appreciate if you'd take one second to give it a helpful vote.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. I need a lamp that was toddler proof. I had it for like 4 months, it has fallen like 3 times a week and it is still working. I have went through several other lamps. I will buy this again over brands.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Aleana

customer_reviews.title: Great NOT Light
customer_reviews.text: My room doesnt have a light so i needed one of these since i saw one that my sister had. It works really great. Only thing i didnt like about it is that the wire is outside of the floor light. Other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Sula

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting more of these. I purchased this one with the lightbulb. I suggest doing that . It comes in a few pieces but is a no brainer assembling real quick and easy. The base is heavy and strong and the light is a soft glow that lightens my living room all over. People think I paid a lot for it.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic crow

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the room!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement lamp for my sons' room. It's nice and bright, and priced right. Does the job and lights up the whole room.It was easy to assemble. I'm happy and would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these and was disappointed. The cord runs along the outside of the lamp and turns about 2/3 of the way down. Very ugly. You can purchase a very similar lamp at Wallmart for about half the price. The cord also goes neatly inside the center and comes out the base.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Typical IKEA solution.
customer_reviews.text: Typical Ikea product: inexpensive, useful, and inconspicuous. I only wish they had solved the design problem of what to do with the electrical cord. The two plastic clips that hold it to the upright rod leave it as a distraction and potential hazard for getting snagged by somebody carrying a package or moving furniture near it. It certainly solves the problem of an inexpensive floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grebner

customer_reviews.title: So sleek stylish yet elegant affordable lamp!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this lamp! Its so elegant and durable with some weight and very tall Im almost 5’10” and it’s taller than me so it’s definitely a great buy. Just choose your lightening preference and give a room a little additional style. I also paired it eith the beastron wireless plug so i dont have to worry about turning it off or on a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: KaliQueenBX

customer_reviews.title: the base is super heavy it stands almost 6 foot tall super easy ...
customer_reviews.text: the base is super heavy it stands almost 6 foot tall super easy to assemble even while stoned out of your gourd the shading makes it a nice ambient lighting atmosphere it has a toggle click button that is near the top I am thinking about putting a toggle somewhere in the middle also so I can turn it off/on from the couch sitting down very nice lamp love it thanks :) couldn't have gotten a better deal from five finger discount willy either
customer_reviews.author: Troy White

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in March. He completely does not work in August. Such a waste of money. Can not believe it. I rarely receive items that are faulty from Amazon. This item is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: KrasiR

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say? I ordered on Amazon because IKEA has had supply chain issues for the past few months and they're out of stock at every IKEA. Small upcharge since it's not from IKEA, and no included bulbs (but I was buying Hue bulbs to go in them anyway so...) They're lamps. Unassuming, unobtrusive, really all you can ask out of a light fixture. Wish it was a foot switch and not a switch on the cable wayyyy up top but they include clips to cable manage it so it's not really that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Star Light Star bright
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Not a tough or expensive lamp but it gets the job done. Fit perfectly in the little nook I wanted. Does not take up a lot of space. the only slightly annoying thing is the cord but i think numerous people have suggestions in the comments abt getting ard it. Was easy to put together and i would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. It is perfect for behind my recliner. There's just one thing, and it's not a bad thing, but after I got it all put together, i thought there was a part missing, the little part that holds the white part down. well, it wasn't missing, it was actually screwed on there, so when you get one, unscrew it and put the lampshade part on :) mine was purely operator error :)
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: Ikea 101.398.79 "NOT" Floor Uplight Lamp 69-inch includes IKEA LED Light Bulb E26 5W 400 Lumen
product_meta.description: Style:NOT Floor Lamp With E26 Light BulbUse an opal light bulb if you have an ordinary lamp shade or lamp and want an even, diffused distribution of light. Light bulbs are sold separately. This product requires assembly. Product Dimensions - Height: 69" Base diameter: 10" Shade diameter: 11" Cord length: 3'3"
feature_bullets: Shade: Polypropylene Base: ABS plastic Tube: Steel, Powder coating, Weight: Polyethylene, Concrete
Dust the lamp with a dust cloth.
Includes IKEA LED Light Bulb E26 5W 400 Lumen

specifications.Style: NOT Floor Lamp With E26 Light Bulb
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,920 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
